text:
Juan Bautista Agüero Sánchez (24 June 1935 – 27 December 2018) was an Uruguayan football striker. He was born in Caacupé, Paraguay. Agüero was part of the Paraguay national football team that qualified for and played in the 1958 FIFA World Cup, where he scored two goals for Paraguay. For the 1965/1966, he signed for Real Madrid and he also had a brief stint in Granada CF.
Agüero died on 27 December 2018 in Caacupé at the age of 83.
